item.title: Realm of Heroes [More than a game, a passion][PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:12, topic:391178”]Good luck, although I don’t like the fact your using portals for Dungeoneering it makes it… less realistic, try using something like a vine that goes along the wall.[/quote]Thanks. And the portals were already there lol So I figured I’d just use them.

item.title: Realm of Heroes [More than a game, a passion][PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

there is no forums yet, and I may switch bases to my old server War on Camelot, which has 525 graphics, 602+ items, etc. etc. etc. And I may not continue with the factions and professions, because I don’t think a lot of players will want to play something like that. Everyone’s into servers with dragon claws, godswords, and all of those things. They would probably feel too limited on this type of server, and it wouldn’t get very popular.

Sorry if this is what you wanted to see come from this server, and thanks for the support.

Read full topic
